step.message: Good choice, maybe one day you’ll become just as great as your father with a blade.
I can only hope.
See you late-
Sounds of horns blaring All three men give each other a look, and blot out of the shop to face whatever has invaded the village.
That was the war horns, that can only mean bad things. Whatever happens son, follow my lead.
Alright
All men stand down!
As leader of this village, I demand you tell us who you are, why you are here, and who sent you.
Very well then. I am General Ursicinus. I am from the Lues Empire and my commanding leader is Trajan.
You haven't told me why you’re here yet, and i suggest you tell me soon, or I will have my men attack you and your men.

Oh no, I understand. I saved the best part for last *sly smile* My orders are to take the leader of every village, to make for a more, how do u say... simple conquest? You have just made my job a lot simpler. Now do we have to take you by force, and are you going to come willingly
Hahaha, you think we fear you. You are nothing but a man. What does one man mean to the army of our village.
I was hoping you would say that *sly smile* The thing is I don’t need you to fear me. Heh, I don’t even want you to fear me, you should fear them
A Cavalry of 100 men and horses revel themselves from the bushes
Bring it on, we can take you.
You are but a mere boy, a pain to say the least. You sure are outspoken you must be out of your place. Unless..... MEN! grab that young man.
Okay now that that’s settled, its you, or your son, pick your poison.
Father, let them take me. I can handle them! They ar- oofff
While my men beat your son for his intolerance, will you be willing to make a trade?
... yes
